ComicInfo.Summary: The mad space-faring adventurer Colonel Weird and his trusty robot companion Talky-Walky have spent months mapping out the bizarre intricacies of the Para-zone only to find themselves trapped in a interdimensional nightmare in which there is no escape! Featuring a special 2-page Inspector Insector backup story by Rich Tommaso!

ComicInfo.Title: Inspector Insector In: The Case of the Electric Boy Part Three
